import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { EntradaService } from '../entrada.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-entrada-page', templateUrl: './entrada-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./entrada-page.component.css'] }) export class EntradaPageComponent { numProcessos:Number; numMunicipios:Number; numResponsaveis:Number; constructor(private service:EntradaService){ } ngOnInit(){ this.fetchNumProcessos(); this.fetchNumMunicipios(); this.fetchNum } }
